recipe.title: Peaches and Tomatoes with Burrata and Hot Sauce
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. mild hot sauce (such as Crystal or Frank’s)
3 ripe peaches or nectarines, cut into wedges
2 large ripe tomatoes or 1 lb. mixed tomatoes, sliced
1 (8-oz.) ball burrata or fresh mozzarella, torn into large pieces
instructions: Whisk oil, hot sauce, vinegar, and honey in a small bowl until honey is dissolved; season with kosher salt. Toss peaches, tomatoes, and half of dressing in a medium bowl; let sit 5 minutes. Transfer fruit salad to a platter. Top with burrata and drizzle with remaining dressing. Scatter a few torn tarragon sprigs over and season with sea salt.
